name: SARCOPH
description:
SEARCH, SURVIVE, ESCAPE

The SARCOPH monster is BACK in a new perspective on Action Horror!

You are trapped inside a secret floor of an abandoned building.
Find and recover the 5 idols back to the elevator.
The Occupant guards the idols and will try to stop you.
Hide and use your tool to survive.

Good Luck

SARCOPH DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, 6, 6 Plus; iPad Air, Mini 2, 3; iPod Touch 6th gen and lower.
